subject: Re: Fw: Wolf IQ | Annual Pro Plan for Westcoat website

full_threads.body:
Hi Michaela,

Thanks for your patience while we worked this through.

Andy looped us in to take a closer look, and I’m happy to share that we’ve now resolved the issue.

I ran tests across both forms on the site to track this down:
  • Standard Contact Page – this was working as expected and submissions were coming through correctly.
  • “Get a Quote” popup – this was the cause of the problem. A security setting was preventing the success message from displaying, so users were left seeing a loading spinner and understandably submitting the form multiple times.

That setting has now been adjusted, and the popup form is confirming submissions instantly. This should stop the duplicate enquiries and give customers clear reassurance that their request has gone through.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you notice anything else, always happy to help however we can!

action.text: Adriane Roa changed the customer to admin@westcoat.com.au

full_threads.body:
Hey @allieB , this should be resolved now - I have gone through the plugins and this seems to be caused by a security plugin Headers Security Advanced & HSTS WP . It's not something I see in all our websites under Wolf IQ so I reckon we didn't install it. Nonetheless, I've adjusted the settings to stop the loading issue - all good now 💯.

To be sure, you can try the form yourself by clicking on the "GET A FREE QUOTE" button here https://westcoat.com.au/
Hey @adriane please prioritize this ticket this morning, and let me review first before sending

Hi Michaela,

Thanks for reaching out!

I'm sorry to hear that and appreciate you letting us know.

I'm going to loop in the @Wolf IQ Support to help me look into this high priority Tuesday morning.

We'll investigate and get back to you shortly.

Thanks,
Andy

On Mon, Jan 12, 2026 at 5:14 PM Westcoat Admin <admin@westcoat.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

We are still having issues with our webpage contact form.

When a customer submits and enquiry the webpage presents as loading and never shows that the form has been submitted. This results in customers submitting their request multiple times and then they follow up by email as they are still not sure of we have received it. By the time we come into the office the next morning there are roughly 10 enquires from the same individual.

I know you guys have taken a look before but it doesn't seem to have ever resolved and we have daily complaints from customers which we would really like to eliminate as it has become very time consuming discussing the issues with potential customers daily.

Kind Regards,

Mikaela Jenkins - Operations Manager
(08) 6499 9931
https://westcoat.com.au/
Roofing and Gutters Perth | Repairs & Restorations
